verbose_text: According to Missiaglia and colleagues [XREF_BIBR], microsatellite instable-high (MSI) and BRAF mutation were predominate among proximal (right sided) tumours, while distal cancers (left sided) were characterised by chromosome instable, high expression of epiregulin, and human epidermal growth factor receptor 2 (HER2) amplification [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
